tool.name: Step 3: Transcript calling

param.name: sqlite_db
param.label: Sqlite DB with RIBO-seq data after mapping
param.help: The SQLite results database should at least contain output from the RIBO-seq mapping.

param.name: ensembl_db
param.label: Select the correct ensembl annotation DB
param.help: The Ensembl sqlite databases are species and annotation version specific. If your genome of interest is not listed - contact your administrator.

param.name: min_count
param.label: The minimum reads for a transcript to be called.

param.name: no_of_samples
param.label: The number of iterations when generating a negative set.

param.name: alpha
param.label: The proportion of noise when generating a negative set.

param.name: which
param.label: Whether the default score threshold should be used or whether the threshold needs to be estimated by using a permutation test.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
Based on the SQLite database holding the experimental data from RIBO-seq mapping, this tool determines the translated transcripts for a given untreated/CHX/EMT-treated ribosome profiling data set (=DATA1 from RNA-mapping in 'Step 1: Mapping (both RNA-seq and RIBO-seq)'). There are two possible methods for doing this.
The first method uses annotation info from Ensembl to determine the exon structure of all possible transcipts. Based on the coverage over the exons, this method tool uses rules about the exon coverage to determine which transcripts are called as translated transcripts.
A second method uses the zero-inflated binomial model (RiboZINB) to determine the acitvely translated transcript isoforms.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
An sqlite database holding experimental data from the RNA-mapping (RIBO-seq).
For the rule-based method, a species and annotation-version specific sqlite Ensembl database. The location of this database should be included in the ENS_db.loc file, located in the main tool directory.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
An sqlite database holding all experimental data from the RIBO-seq mapping and transcript calling/translation tool. After the transcript calling an extra table will be added:
(NOTE: annotations as CCDS identifier and canonical transcript are also inserted for further filtering of the transcripts) ::
